quotes.quote: The best confidence builder is experience.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One who is full loathes honey, but to one who is hungry everything bitter is sweet.
quotes.author: Proverbs 27:7, ESV

quotes.quote: No man preaches his sermon well to others if he doth not first preach it to his own heart.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: Peace if possible, truth at all costs!
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don't keep your feet, there's no knowing where you might be swept off to.
quotes.author: Bilbo Baggins

quotes.quote: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
quotes.author: William Wallace

quotes.quote: They who would give up an essential liberty for temporary security, deserve neither liberty or security.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To preserve liberty, it is essential that the whole body of people always possess arms, and be taught alike, especially when young, how to use themâ€¦
quotes.author: Richard Henry Lee

quotes.quote: You will never know how much it has cost my generation to preserve your freedom. I hope you will make a good use of it.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke
